pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Chinese Characters into Pinyin, Sijiao, Wubi or Other Codes // Convert Chinese characters into Pinyin (the official romanization system for Standard Chinese in mainland China, Malaysia, Singapore, and Taiwan. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pinyin for details), Sijiao (four or five numerical digits per character. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four-Corner_Method.), Wubi (an input method with five strokes. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wubi_method) or user-defined codes.
